00039             gp_source(gps), gp_target(gpt), syn_mech_cfg_(sm_cfg), plast_mech_cfg_(pm_cfg), connectivity_cfg_(c_cfg),
00040             weight_distrib_cfg_(wd_cfg), delay_distrib_cfg_(dd_cfg) {}

00112 inline void ParNetwork::update()
00113 {
00114     for (ListGroupType::const_iterator i = gp_list_.begin();
00115             i != gp_list_.end();
00116             ++i)
00117         (*i)->update();
00118 
00119 }
00120 
00123 inline void ParNetwork::clear_past_of_spike_list(const Time & time_end_past)
00124 {
00125     for (ListGroupType::const_iterator i = gp_list_.begin(); i != gp_list_.end(); ++i)
00126         (*i)->clear_past_of_spike_list(time_end_past);
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00132 inline void ParNetwork::build_cell_list()
00133 {
00134 //TODO Check this
00135     for (ListGroupType::const_iterator i = gp_list_.begin();
00136             i != gp_list_.end();
00137             ++i)
00138         for (ListNrnType::iterator j = (*i)->list_.begin();
00139                 j != (*i)->list_.end();
00140                 ++j)
00141             cell_list.push_back((*j));
00142 
00143 }
00144 
00146 inline void ParNetwork::create_population(){
00147     for (ListGroupType::const_iterator i = gp_list_.begin();
00148             i != gp_list_.end();
00149             ++i)
00150         (*i)->create_population();
00151 }
00152 
00154 inline int ParNetwork::network_size()
00155 {
00156     return cell_list.size();
00157 }
